title: Large-scale blended teaching methodology for strengthening nursing practice competencies: Applying patient-centered nursing protocols

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing knowledge (diagnostic procedures, symptom observation, primary care) and practical experience
context.additional_context: For in-service practitioners, combines theory and practice in online project-based learning. Strengthens competencies applicable to actual clinical settings through patient diagnosis scenarios and medical team collaboration case analyses.

learning_goals: Learners achieve ≥80% comprehension of foundational nursing theories (patient assessment, symptom management, treatment protocols) via online lectures and multimedia within four weeks.
Learners improve patient safety and emergency response problem-solving skills by ≥70% through weekly activity-based learning (case studies, simulations).
Learners apply ≥3 workplace stress management strategies (self-care, team collaboration, patient communication) learned from a wellness education module.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
